name: Kitchenette
description: Published exclusively on the territory of France (and in a foreign language) was the gameization of a certain intellectual television quiz show - apparently, it really existed (maybe negatively) on television. In subsequent reviews, the games are called the French “answer” to the popular Russian-language series “You Don’t Know Jack,” while specifically emphasizing that the game was voiced by “Christian and Odette themselves” (probably for its “real” version). Let’s admit right away that, despite the “perky”, there is not much “sharp” humor here, but the game itself is made much more original than “Jack”.
